title: University honours geologist who mapped hidden worlds from the Peak District’s Bottomless Pit to the ...
text: ( Source : University of Derby ) Date posted: 1 October 2015 A geologist whose fascination with rocks started as a boy in the caves of the Peak District and who is still publishing research at the age of 90 is to receive an Honorary
